com.gtomato.android.ui.widget

Class CarouselView.OnScrollListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gtomato.android.ui.widget.CarouselView.OnScrollListener
  • Enclosing class:
    CarouselView

    public abstract static class CarouselView.OnScrollListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Definition of a callback to be invoked when a CarouselView has been scrolled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OnScrollListener() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFling(CarouselView carouselView)
      Callback method to be invoked when CarouselView is animating to a final position while not under outside control.
      void onScrollBegin(CarouselView carouselView)
      Callback method to be invoked when CarouselView is being dragged by outside input such as user touch input.
      void onScrolled(CarouselView carouselView, int dx, int dy)
      Callback method to be invoked when the CarouselView has been scrolled.

      Callback method to be invoked when the CarouselView has been scrolled.

      Callback method to be invoked when CarouselView stops scrolling.
      void onScrollStateChanged(CarouselView carouselView, int newState)
      Callback method to be invoked when CarouselView's scroll state changes.

        Callback method to be invoked when CarouselView is being dragged by outside input such as user touch input.

        public void onFling(CarouselView carouselView)
        Callback method to be invoked when CarouselView is animating to a final position while not under outside control.
        Parameters:
        carouselView -

      • onScrollStateChanged

        public void onScrollStateChanged(CarouselView carouselView,
                                 int newState)
        Callback method to be invoked when CarouselView's scroll state changes.
        Parameters:
        carouselView - The CarouselView whose scroll state has changed.
        newState - The updated scroll state. One of RecyclerView.SCROLL_STATE_IDLE, RecyclerView.SCROLL_STATE_DRAGGING or RecyclerView.SCROLL_STATE_SETTLING.

      • onScrolled

        public void onScrolled(CarouselView carouselView,
                       int dx,
                       int dy)
        Callback method to be invoked when the CarouselView has been scrolled. This will be called after the scroll has completed.
        Parameters:
        carouselView - The CarouselView which has been scrolled.
        dx - The amount of horizontal scroll.
        dy - The amount of vertical scroll.

      • onScrolled

        public void onScrolled(CarouselView carouselView,
                       int position,
                       int adapterPosition,
                       float offset)
        Callback method to be invoked when the CarouselView has been scrolled. This will be called after the scroll has completed.
        Parameters:
        carouselView - The CarouselView which has been scrolled.
        position - Current position.
        adapterPosition - Current adapter position.
        offset - The decimal part of the current position, in the range of [0, 1).
